reviews.customers_say: Customers find the nightgown gorgeous, comfortable, and easy to sleep in, with a soft silky feel and good fit. The material quality receives mixed feedback, with some finding it beautiful while others describe it as cheap, and several customers note that the size runs small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy & Comfy
items.body: Love! My husband and I are celebrating our 21st anniversary this weekend. The traditional gift for the milestone is copper. For that reason, I decided on a copper colored nighty. I ordered the caramel color, and it did not disappoint! It‚Äôs more copper than caramel for sure. It is so pretty & sexy. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô6‚Äù 160lbs and 36DD. I ordered the medium, and the fit is almost perfect. It‚Äôs just a tiny bit too large for me. It‚Äôs so comfy that I‚Äôll probably put it in my regular nightgown rotation. This is a BUY BABY BUY! I‚Äôd add a pic, but the top is see-throughüòÜ Read more
items.author: brooke

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!
items.body: I am 5‚Äô9‚Äù, 170-175lbs, 34G, wide hips, and ordered a large. It fits well as a flowy type of fit, if I wanted it to be super fitted I could definitely have gone with a medium. The dark emerald green color is beautiful. Made me feel so sexy and my hubs loved it! Read more
items.author: Maddy S.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute set!
items.body: Very flattering! I loved all the color options and the satin feels nice and luxurious. The fit is nice too, and the lace around the breasts covers just enough! Read more
items.author: Dani Miko

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice
items.body: Perfect fit for my wife! Very satin feel and look! Read more
items.author: idealsdead1

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very flattering!
items.body: I‚Äôm 5‚Äô3 and a 38 DDD, the XL fit perfectly. I returned the XXL as it was too big and did not provide support. The lace around breast is stretchy and offers some support unlike other nighties that don‚Äôt provide anything. The fabric is soft and length is perfect, not too short or long. Color is true to what is online. Adjustable straps are a must. I would definitely order again. Read more
items.author: Taya Ferris

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very cute and quality materials
items.body: Great little cami, the small just was too big for me cus I'm extremely small and needed to order the X small,im tall with medium hips and booty,but fairly petite bust, so the top part was too wide for me, it does adjust very well acually compared to most camis like this, it has straps that both adjust thesides and neck,but the fabric came around the sides of my ribcage too far for it to look right, if I had even just maybe half a cup size bigger, like a 34 B, it'd of fit me perfectly, but I'm more of an A cup size,34 small, just couldn't get this to fit me correctly. I do find as a small busted woman that adjustable halters usually fit me best rather than spaghetti straps over shoulders. But this was a good price and thought ide give it a try. And like i said, itde of been perfect probably if i got the extra small size. Returned couple weeks ago to order smaller size,but still haven't received refund so i can order and maybe get on time before V day. Dont order if your not sure on size and need it for VDay, refunds dont happen within 7 days is all i know. Us petite girls can have just as much difficulty finding cute tops that fit right as do large busted women have trying to find large not boring black or beige colored bras and tummy control camis that arent what you want you man or partner to see. Thats why Amaozn has been a life saver usually, being able to order something but easily able to return anything that doesnt fit so i can reorder right size quickly. Do wish they offered a size exchange thatd be a faster route than what a return and refund takes,which now has been about 2 weeks since I sent back, too long of a wait and i become extremely frustrated waiting, and end up just going to a physical clothing or lingerie store to do my purchases. Ive recently begun to think that just keeping the wrong sizes or missfittiting items and sell it online cus it seems to be a faster turn around than what a basic return takes with Amazon these days. Upped my membership price and then started keeping my money they take for items ive returned and they have again, I must assume they're thinking i wont notice i never got refunded for my return. When really I'm documenting every single date, time and chat conversation involving my orders and returns, recording conversations and screen recording all my Amazon chats, and keeping a detailed file of the funds being stolen from my bank account by them. Not refunding a customer for theyre unused, totally legitimate, within time frame stated by them, done precisely by they're Amazon printed rule book, is plane and obvious theft, that is a criminal act by law. My best friend is a triple F and she's always stuck with ugly colored bras and camisoles, as I'm stuck with dang near early tween training bras with hot pink daisy florals, never anything lacey or "sexy". Read more
items.author: Elohi

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Delicate Design
items.body: Is pretty and has a nice V-neck with delicate lace, but the material is quite thin. It feels smooth against the skin, but it doesn‚Äôt provide much coverage or warmth. The fit is mostly true to size, but I would size up for a more comfortable fit. It‚Äôs a fine option for occasional use or lounging, but the thin fabric makes it feel less substantial than I hoped. Read more
items.author: Jeanette

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red02, B Purple, Black Floral, Red Heart, Floral Blue, Ice Green, Black, Champagne, Black02, Big Floral, Black Pink Floral, Royal Blue, B White, Kelly Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
